Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.content:
## Responsible Entity 

Luna News, operated by Alberto Luna, contact: neongeeksofficial@gmail.com 

## Personal Data We Collect 

Currently, we only collect users' language preferences. 

No other personal data is collected on our site. 

## Purpose of Data Processing 

The collected language preferences are used solely by Luna News to configure and personalize the content language on our site, in order to provide a better user experience. 

## Use of Information 

The information regarding language preferences is used exclusively within the same site and is not shared with third parties. 

## Changes to the Privacy Notice 

This Privacy Notice may undergo modifications, changes, or updates due to new legal requirements, our own needs, our privacy practices, or other causes. We commit to keeping you informed about any changes to this notice through our website. 

### Last updated: *30-07-2024* 

--- 

**Luna News**

TermsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
TermsAndConditions.content:
## Terms and Conditions 

### 1. Website Name 

This website, **Luna news**, is operated and managed with the purpose of providing our users with the most relevant news in the technological world. 

### 2. Purpose of the Site 

The primary objective of Luna news is to publish informative and educational content related to the latest innovations and advancements in technology. 

### 3. Prohibitions 

Plagiarism and any attempts to steal content are strictly prohibited. All users accessing this site must refrain from copying, reproducing, distributing, or otherwise using the content without the express authorization of the owners of Luna news. 

### 4. Requirements to Access the Site 

Access to this site is intended exclusively for users who enjoy the provided content and do not take opinions or information personally. 

### 5. Use and Consultation of the Site 

Currently, the use and consultation of the Luna news website are entirely free of charge. However, we reserve the right to modify this policy in the future, with prior notification to our users. 

### 6. Prohibited Activities 

Using this website for illegal, harmful activities or those that may harm other users is prohibited. This includes, but is not limited to, harassment, spreading computer viruses, and any other malicious behavior. 

### 7. Ownership of Content 

Luna news is the exclusive owner of all text content on this website. 

### 8. Responsibility for External Sites 

Luna news is not responsible for the content, accuracy, or privacy policies of external websites that may be linked to our site. The inclusion of any link does not imply approval or endorsement by Luna news. 

### 9. Modifications to the Terms and Conditions 

Luna news reserves the right to make changes to these terms and conditions at any time. Any modifications will be communicated to users through our website. 

--- 

**Luna news**

bio.p2: Creator of Luna News, Software Engineer, but above all, I'm passionate about technology.

bio.p4: Buckle up and get ready for this knowledge journey, Luna News style.

About.content:
Welcome! I'm Alberto Luna, the creator of Luna Newsâ€”a platform dedicated to delivering the latest ``programming`` news from around the globe. Our mission is to keep you informed, inspired, and connected with the ever-evolving world of technology.

## Our Values

- **Objectivity:** We are committed to presenting news impartially, free from political, religious, or ideological bias.
- **Accuracy:** Every piece of information is thoroughly verified to ensure it is both accurate and reliable.
- **Relevance:** We prioritize news that matters to our audience and has a meaningful impact on their lives.

Luna News is more than just a news website. It is a vision to build a community where information empowers, inspires, and connects people. We strive to be your trusted source for programming news, helping you stay engaged and informed in a rapidly changing world.

```javascript
console.log("Welcome to Luna News!");
```
